parameters.jsCode:
// Create simple sample products
const products = [
  {
    product_name: 'HDFC Personal Loan',
    provider: 'HDFC Bank',
    interest_rate: 10.50,
    min_amount: 50000,
    max_amount: 4000000,
    min_income: 30000,
    min_credit_score: 700,
    max_credit_score: 850,
    min_age: 21,
    max_age: 65,
    employment_required: true,
    tenure_months: 60,
    url: 'https://www.hdfcbank.com',
    eligibility_criteria: '{"source": "HDFC Bank"}'
  },
  {
    product_name: 'ICICI Personal Loan',
    provider: 'ICICI Bank',
    interest_rate: 11.25,
    min_amount: 25000,
    max_amount: 2000000,
    min_income: 25000,
    min_credit_score: 650,
    max_credit_score: 850,
    min_age: 18,
    max_age: 60,
    employment_required: true,
    tenure_months: 72,
    url: 'https://www.icicibank.com',
    eligibility_criteria: '{"source": "ICICI Bank"}'
  }
];

return products.map(product => ({ json: product }));
